Html:
Hello,

I have ASP.Net 2.0, SQL Server 2000 & Visual Studio 2005. Can I run KiGG?

I tried going through the installation steps and got stuck on #5 - Now Open the Kigg.sln in Visual Studio. The .sln file was made in VS 2008 and doesn't open up in VS 2005. If I can run KiGG with this setup, could you repack .sln for me so its compatible with VS 2005?

Appreciate your help!
N.

Hi NKumer,

I am afraid it does not work in VS2005, same as ASP.NET MVC and LinqToSQL.
Thanks for replying promptly. If you think of a way in future or have an alternative please do let me know. Thanks!
Thanks for replying promptly. If you think of a way in future or have an alternative please do let me know. Thanks!
